directions.text: Mix dry ingredients then add shortening.
Add ⅔ cup cold water gradually, mix until pie crust consistency.
Knead until smooth on a floured board.
Cover with a tea towel for 5 mins.
Roll dough out ⅛" thick, then cut into 3" squares.
Fry with oil in a medium pan a few at a time turning frequently till golden brown.
Drain oil from dough, cover with cinnamon and let dry.
